Locale.Value:
[New Feature] We are excited to introduce our powerful AI assistant, Lumi, to you. It can assist you in summarizing and explaining, proofreading, AI-Written detecting, and rewriting your content.
Support detecting AI-generated content
Optimize AI summary of PDF documents or paragraph content
Optimize AI proofreading of paragraph content
Optimize AI rewriting of paragraph content
Optimize AI explanation of paragraph or word meanings
Support converting PDF to image-based PDF
Corrections and improvements in many small details
Fix the crash issue that might occur in certain situations
